named-query.name: BC_READ_MEASUREMENT_BY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT measurement FROM com.enclothe.core.measurement.domain.Measurement measurement WHERE measurement.id = :measurementId

named-query.name: BC_DEFAULT_ORDERITEM_ID
named-query.query: SELECT orderItemState FROM com.enclothe.core.dm.order.domain.EncOrderItemStates orderItemState WHERE orderItemState.id = :orderItemStateId

named-query.name: BC_DEFAULT_ORDERITEM_STATE_DETAIL_ID
named-query.query: SELECT orderItemStateDetail FROM com.enclothe.core.dm.order.domain.EncOrderItemStateDetail orderItemStateDetail WHERE orderItemStateDetail.id = :orderItemStateDetailId

named-query.name: BC_DEFAULT_USER_CATEGORY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT userCategory FROM com.enclothe.core.common.domain.UserCategory userCategory WHERE userCategory.id = :userCategoryId
